Add rest, add pebble ice, swizzle, add pebble ice

lines: Rocks glass w/ ice or coupe

reference: Gaige, Crosby. (1945). *Cocktail Guide and Ladies' Companion.*

Garnish w/ spent lime hull & a mint sprig

name: Lost Lake’s Mai Tai
lines: 1 rhum agricole (Neisson Eleve Sous Bois Rhum Agricole)

lines: Strain into rocks glass w/ ice

lines: Shake, strain into Collins glass w/ ice
